title: Governance Voting
description: Submit and vote on proposals to execute Python code within the realm
no_proposals_hint: Be the first to submit a proposal!

form.title: Submit New Proposal
form.description: Create a new governance proposal with Python code to be executed if approved by the community.
form.success: Proposal submitted successfully! It will be reviewed before voting begins.

placeholders.title: Enter a clear, descriptive title for your proposal
placeholders.description: Describe what this proposal does and why it should be approved

help.code_url: Link to the Python code that will be executed if this proposal passes

security.title: Security Notice
security.point1: All code will be reviewed before voting begins
security.point2: Code checksums will be verified before execution
security.point3: Only approved proposals can modify realm logic

security_warning.title: Security Warning:
security_warning.message: Always review the code carefully before voting. Approved proposals will execute with realm privileges.
